document_type: Final Determination Notification & Payroll Authorization Forms
security: The document contains Social Security numbers, the public disclosure of which could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy.
summary: This document is a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding HSCA staff payroll records, specifically concerning Gale Lynn Oppenberg. It includes payroll authorization forms detailing her employment with the House Select Committee on Assassinations, and a memo confirming her start date and salary.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the employment of Gale Lynn Oppenberg with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). It includes a Final Determination Notification regarding the postponement of information (Social Security numbers) due to privacy concerns. It also features payroll authorization forms reflecting Oppenberg's appointment as a Research Attorney, her salary adjustments, and eventual termination. A memo from I. Charles Mathews confirms her starting date and salary, and a form certifies that she is not related to any current member of Congress. The documents were reviewed by the Assassination Records Review Board, with a next review date set for 2017.
title: HSCA Staff Payroll Records: Gale Lynn Oppenberg Employment Details
recipient: Thomas Howarth, Budget Officer; Elizabeth Berning, Chief Clerk
